title: ASCDO21
author: ASCDO21
content: Hi all.I decided to set myself a goal - to save money for an apartment with the help of cryptocurrency. The cost of the apartment is $130,000.At the moment there are 6000$ in cryptocurrencyMy portfolio consists of BTC,ETH,XRP,SOL,DOT,XLM,ADAReady to invest $500 per month.Advise on the best way to fix profits and what kind of cryptocurrency to buy. Now the markets have fallen - it's time to buy.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Diversifying the assets in your portfolio is a good option in my opinion - but get more bitcoin than altcoin. Basically you can't expect to make a fast profit on an investment - that's because investing takes time that even you have to wait for a few years just to get 2x for the return. You can still make a profit trading - but even then it is risky if you don't have the good skills to do it.Remember - price volatility can give you profits as well as losses. But if you are able to take advantage of price volatility - it is very possible for you to get profits which then accelerate yourself to achieve what you want. But this is all risky - so do it with care and consideration.

comments.author: Knight Hider
comments.body: I would keep >90% in Bitcoin. Bitcoin outperforms most altcoins, unless you buy a lucky one.--Knight Hider

Now the markets have fallen - it's time to buy.At the moment, the prices of all crypto currencies have dropped significantly. This is a good time for short term investment and long term investment. There are many good coins in the crypto currency market that have the potential to give a good profit in the future, but as far as I think the coming time may be of AI coins. If you invest some part of your monthly $500 in AI coins, then it can prove to be a better decision for you in the future. Ocean Protocol Ajix and RNDR are good choices. To get profit always try to buy whenever the price of a coin falls and DCA will prove to be the best strategy. Apart from this, your portfolio also contains very good coins, from which you are expected to get a good profit, and you will be able to save a good amount of money to buy your apartment.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: considering the value of many bitcoins and altcoins right now are highly undervalued after the collapse of some companies in the past it should be good idea to keep accumulating like that, if good things come and best scenario plays out then you will easily double your investment in the upcoming bullruns or even more.i'd say invest heavily in bitcoin and ethereum, but some altcoin is also worth investing, its just that I guess for long term its a lot safer investing in coin with big market capitalisation, and only use small capital to invest in some of the altcoins, since its short term, you could kinda make some fast market movement after the altcoin you invested is rising high, truth to be told, you should follow those new coin investment launched by some exchanges that resembles like sui and arkham, just find coins that really have high potential like that and invest small capital, it will give massive return but its not financial advice though, you should always follow your own decision.

comments.body: It’s great to have a goal in mind. I would use a stop-loss order to determine profit. As for buying crypto, your portfolio already looks good. I would put more on BTC and ETH as they are the most stable. However, it is important to do your research before investing. Good luck with your goal!

I suggest buying more bitcoins and giving a bigger portion instead of buying altcoins or increasing the amount again. Especially if you can use $ 500 every month because I think that's enough to invest in bitcoin while waiting for the bull run. Or from $ 500 per month, use $ 300-$400 to invest in bitcoin and the remaining $ 100-$200 to invest in altcoins, so you are already running two types of short and medium term investments as well as long term investments. But that's just a suggestion. You should find out more about the altcoin selection.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: ASCDO21 on August 08, 2023, 05:24:37 PMHi all.I decided to set myself a goal - to save money for an apartment with the help of cryptocurrency. The cost of the apartment is $130,000.At the moment there are 6000$ in cryptocurrencyMy portfolio consists of BTC,ETH,XRP,SOL,DOT,XLM,ADAReady to invest $500 per month.Advise on the best way to fix profits and what kind of cryptocurrency to buy. Now the markets have fallen - it's time to buy.None.I will not advice anything to you anymore.It seems like you know what's the quickest, and most safest way to earn in cryptocurrency already which is to buy those top coins in terms of market cap, and hold it for quite some time. You are also doing DCA with a huge amount on a monthly basis. You've also said that the markets have fallen, and yes it really is. This year is the accumulation phase where investors are slowly accumulating coins in preparation for the bull run.Ohhh wait. Best way to fix profits you asked? Same as what you are doing with buying. Do DCA in selling as well. Set targets where you will sell a portion of your holdings if it reaches that price. For me, my target selling price for Bitcoin is I think $75,000, $90,000, $100,000, and I might keep some Bitcoins if it goes higher even more. You still have a long way to go just by looking at your target, and the amount of money you invested already, but just trust the process, and continue DCA. Just focus on top coins as well, and don't forget to sell when you're confident with the profits already. Good luck OP.
